Hello.

Welcome to the landing page.

About

Hi! I'm Steven, and I'm a student at Rice majoring in computer science (how unique, I know). I love to design. I made this website because I want to showcase what I'm building, and because it's fun™.


I always enjoy imagining things to make, so I'm hoping to work a design-related job in the future. In addition to coding, I also enjoy writing stories, making art, and composing music. I'll add these works in later. While you're here, check out my projects below!


Work

Full Stack Development

CaseCtrl

In summer 2020, I worked with CaseCtrl, a Houston medical startup streamlining the process of surgery scheduling. I contributed to the whole CaseCtrl application: the frontend, backend, and database. I used HTML, jQuery, C#, and SQL (.NET Core REST API) to code features, and I used Docker for testing.

View Project
Web Design

Personal Site

After eons of procrastination, I (finally) made a website. This site was coded from scratch using just the holy trinity. I spent 3 long days building this. Most time was spent drawing the art and making it responsive. This design was something I came up with after I scrapped two old designs.

View Project
Game Design

Intruder

Intruder is a story platformer that I whipped up with a friend. It was written using Pygame. I also wrote the story, created all art, and made the OST. Saying that this took a while would be the understatement of my lifetime. We're planning to remake it with Unity for a better result.

View Project
Mobile Development

Kopis Mobile

This fall, I will be doing a software co-op at Kopis Mobile, a company focused on improving the security of soldiers and first responders. I'll be working on mobile apps, so I'm learning React and then React Native to prepare myself.

View Project
